trans-unit.source: Represents an I/O handle that is bound to the system thread pool and enables low-level components to receive notifications for asynchronous I/O operations.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta un handle di I/O associato al pool di thread di sistema che consente ai componenti di basso livello di ricevere le notifiche per le operazioni di I/O asincrone.

trans-unit.source: Returns an unmanaged pointer to a <see cref="T:System.Threading.NativeOverlapped" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un puntatore non gestito a una struttura <see cref="T:System.Threading.NativeOverlapped" />.

trans-unit.source: An object from which to create the <see cref="T:System.Threading.NativeOverlapped" /> pointer.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto dal quale creare il puntatore <see cref="T:System.Threading.NativeOverlapped" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns an unmanaged pointer to a <see cref="T:System.Threading.NativeOverlapped" /> structure using the callback state and buffers associated with the specified <see cref="T:System.Threading.PreAllocatedOverlapped" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un puntatore non gestito a una struttura <see cref="T:System.Threading.NativeOverlapped" /> mediante lo stato del callback e i buffer associati all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Threading.PreAllocatedOverlapped" /> specificato.

trans-unit.source: An unmanaged pointer to a <see cref="T:System.Threading.NativeOverlapped" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Puntatore non gestito a una struttura <see cref="T:System.Threading.NativeOverlapped" />.

trans-unit.source: The unmanaged pointer returned by this method can be passed to the operating system in overlapped I/O operations.
trans-unit.target: Il puntatore non gestito restituito da questo metodo può essere passato al sistema operativo in operazioni dei / o sovrapposte.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.NativeOverlapped> structure is fixed in physical memory until the <xref:System.Threading.ThreadPoolBoundHandle.FreeNativeOverlapped%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Threading.NativeOverlapped> struttura è fissa nella memoria fisica finché il <xref:System.Threading.ThreadPoolBoundHandle.FreeNativeOverlapped%2A> metodo viene chiamato.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="preAllocated" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="preAllocated" /> è <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="preAllocated" /> is currently in use for another I/O operation.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="preAllocated" /> è attualmente in uso per un'altra operazione di I/O.

trans-unit.source: This method was called after the <see cref="T:System.Threading.ThreadPoolBoundHandle" /> was disposed.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo è stato chiamato dopo l'eliminazione di <see cref="T:System.Threading.ThreadPoolBoundHandle" />.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: oppure

trans-unit.source: This method was called after <paramref name="preAllocated" /> was disposed.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo è stato chiamato dopo l'eliminazione di <paramref name="preAllocated" />.

trans-unit.source: A delegate that represents the callback method to invoke when the asynchronous I/O operation completes.
trans-unit.target: Un delegato che rappresenta il metodo di callback da richiamare al completamento dell'operazione di I/O asincrona.

trans-unit.source: A user-provided object that distinguishes this <see cref="T:System.Threading.NativeOverlapped" /> instance from other <see cref="T:System.Threading.NativeOverlapped" /> instances.
trans-unit.target: Un oggetto specificato dall'utente che distingue l'istanza <see cref="T:System.Threading.NativeOverlapped" /> da altre istanze <see cref="T:System.Threading.NativeOverlapped" />.

trans-unit.source: An object or array of objects that represent the input or output buffer for the operation, or <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Un oggetto o una matrice di oggetti che rappresenta il buffer di input o output per l'operazione o <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Each object represents a buffer, such an array of bytes.
trans-unit.target: Ogni oggetto rappresenta un buffer, ad esempio una matrice di byte.

trans-unit.source: Returns an unmanaged pointer to a <see cref="T:System.Threading.NativeOverlapped" /> structure, specifying a delegate that is invoked when the asynchronous I/O operation is complete, a user-provided object that supplies context, and managed objects that serve as buffers.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un puntatore non gestito a una struttura <see cref="T:System.Threading.NativeOverlapped" />, specificando un delegato che viene richiamato quando l'operazione di I/O asincrona è completata, un oggetto specificato dall'utente che definisce il contesto e gli oggetti gestiti usati come buffer.

trans-unit.source: An unmanaged pointer to a <see cref="T:System.Threading.NativeOverlapped" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Puntatore non gestito a una struttura <see cref="T:System.Threading.NativeOverlapped" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="callback" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="callback" /> è <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: This method was called after the <see cref="T:System.Threading.ThreadPoolBoundHandle" /> object was disposed.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo è stato chiamato dopo l'eliminazione dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Threading.ThreadPoolBoundHandle" />.

trans-unit.source: An object that holds the operating system handle.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto che contiene l'handle del sistema operativo.

trans-unit.source: The handle must have been opened for overlapped I/O in unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: È necessario che l'handle sia stato aperto per operazioni di I/O sovrapposte nel codice non gestito.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Threading.ThreadPoolBoundHandle" /> for the specified handle, which is bound to the system thread pool.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Threading.ThreadPoolBoundHandle" /> per l'handle specificato, associato al pool di thread del sistema.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Threading.ThreadPoolBoundHandle" /> for <paramref name="handle" />, which is bound to the system thread pool.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Threading.ThreadPoolBoundHandle" /> per <paramref name="handle" />, associato al pool di thread del sistema.

trans-unit.source: This method should be called once per handle.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo deve essere chiamato una volta per ogni handle.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.ThreadPoolBoundHandle> object does not take ownership of `handle`; it remains the responsibility of the caller to call <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.SafeHandle.Dispose%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Threading.ThreadPoolBoundHandle> oggetto non accetta la proprietà di `handle`; rimane la responsabilità del chiamante per chiamare <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.SafeHandle.Dispose%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="handle" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="handle" /> è <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="handle" /> has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="handle" /> è stato eliminato.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: oppure

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="handle" /> does not refer to a valid I/O handle.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="handle" /> non fa riferimento a un handle di operazioni di I/O valido.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: oppure

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="handle" /> refers to a handle that has not been opened for overlapped I/O.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="handle" /> fa riferimento a un handle che non è stato aperto per operazioni di I/O sovrapposte.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: oppure

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="handle" /> refers to a handle that has already been bound.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="handle" /> fa riferimento a un handle che è già stato associato.

trans-unit.source: Releases all unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Threading.ThreadPoolBoundHandle" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Rilascia le risorse non gestite usate dall'istanza di <see cref="T:System.Threading.ThreadPoolBoundHandle" />.

trans-unit.source: An unmanaged pointer to the <see cref="T:System.Threading.NativeOverlapped" /> structure structure to be freed.
trans-unit.target: Un puntatore non gestito per la struttura <see cref="T:System.Threading.NativeOverlapped" /> da liberare.

trans-unit.source: Frees the memory associated with a <see cref="T:System.Threading.NativeOverlapped" /> structure allocated by the <see cref="Overload:System.Threading.ThreadPoolBoundHandle.AllocateNativeOverlapped" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Libera la memoria associata a una struttura <see cref="T:System.Threading.NativeOverlapped" /> allocata dal metodo <see cref="Overload:System.Threading.ThreadPoolBoundHandle.AllocateNativeOverlapped" />.

trans-unit.source: You must call the <xref:System.Threading.ThreadPoolBoundHandle.FreeNativeOverlapped%2A> method exactly once on every <xref:System.Threading.NativeOverlapped> unmanaged pointer allocated by using the <xref:System.Threading.ThreadPoolBoundHandle.AllocateNativeOverlapped%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: È necessario chiamare il <xref:System.Threading.ThreadPoolBoundHandle.FreeNativeOverlapped%2A> metodo esattamente una volta su ogni <xref:System.Threading.NativeOverlapped> puntatore non gestito allocato tramite il <xref:System.Threading.ThreadPoolBoundHandle.AllocateNativeOverlapped%2A> metodo.

trans-unit.source: If you do not call the <xref:System.Threading.ThreadPoolBoundHandle.FreeNativeOverlapped%2A> method, you will leak memory.
trans-unit.target: Se non si chiama il <xref:System.Threading.ThreadPoolBoundHandle.FreeNativeOverlapped%2A> metodo, si verificherà una perdita di memoria.

trans-unit.source: If you call the <xref:System.Threading.ThreadPoolBoundHandle.FreeNativeOverlapped%2A> method method more than once on the same <xref:System.Threading.NativeOverlapped> unmanaged pointer, memory will be corrupted.
trans-unit.target: Se si chiama il <xref:System.Threading.ThreadPoolBoundHandle.FreeNativeOverlapped%2A> più volte nello stesso metodo <xref:System.Threading.NativeOverlapped> puntatore non gestito, memoria verrà danneggiata.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="overlapped" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="overlapped" /> è <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: This method was called after the <see cref="T:System.Threading.ThreadPoolBoundHandle" /> object was disposed.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo è stato chiamato dopo l'eliminazione dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Threading.ThreadPoolBoundHandle" />.

trans-unit.source: An unmanaged pointer to the <see cref="T:System.Threading.NativeOverlapped" /> structure from which to return the associated user-provided object.
trans-unit.target: Puntatore non gestito alla struttura <see cref="T:System.Threading.NativeOverlapped" /> dalla quale restituire l'oggetto specificato dall'utente associato.

trans-unit.source: Returns the user-provided object that was specified when the <see cref="T:System.Threading.NativeOverlapped" /> instance was allocated by calling the <see cref="M:System.Threading.ThreadPoolBoundHandle.AllocateNativeOverlapped(System.Threading.IOCompletionCallback,System.Object,System.Object)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce l'oggetto specificato dall'utente quando l'istanza <see cref="T:System.Threading.NativeOverlapped" /> è stata allocata mediante la chiamata del metodo <see cref="M:System.Threading.ThreadPoolBoundHandle.AllocateNativeOverlapped(System.Threading.IOCompletionCallback,System.Object,System.Object)" />.

trans-unit.source: A user-provided object that distinguishes this <see cref="T:System.Threading.NativeOverlapped" /> instance from other <see cref="T:System.Threading.NativeOverlapped" /> instances, or <see langword="null" /> if one was not specified when the intstance was allocated by calling the <see cref="Overload:System.Threading.ThreadPoolBoundHandle.AllocateNativeOverlapped" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto specificato dall'utente che distingue questa istanza <see cref="T:System.Threading.NativeOverlapped" /> da altre istanze <see cref="T:System.Threading.NativeOverlapped" /> oppure <see langword="null" /> se non è stato specificato all'allocazione dell'istanza mediante chiamata del metodo <see cref="Overload:System.Threading.ThreadPoolBoundHandle.AllocateNativeOverlapped" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="overlapped" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="overlapped" /> è <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the bound operating system handle.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'handle del sistema operativo associato.

trans-unit.source: An object that holds the bound operating system handle.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto che contiene l'handle del sistema operativo associato.
